name: Adv3nture.xyz Gemstone
description: Adv3nture.xyz is a web3 gaming ecosystem that is designed to be open, interoperable, and community-owned. It is a platform that allows players to explore an endless world of possibilities, created with artificial intelligence and community-generated content and games. It aims to provide an immersive gaming experience where players can collaborate to conquer challenges and earn rewards. The flagship game of Adv3nture.xyz is Gemscape, an open-world action adventure MMORPG, where players explore the world and gather precious gems to save the land from an ancient curse.
